Core Competencies
Project Management

Policy Analysis
Global Health
Gender
Climate Change

Global Health

I am a highly motivated development professional with a strong interest in the intersection of global health, gender and climate change. I have international experience in Sexual Reproductive Health and Rights (SRHR) and Water, Sanitation and Hygiene (WASH) - including WASH in the context of Schools and Refugees. I also have accumulated practical expertise in the area of Menstrual Hygiene Management (MHM).

Project Management

I am a multilingual project manager with over three years of experience in leading, implementing and managing projects. My experience spans across South Asia and Germany working for organisations such as the German Development Agency (GIZ) and Goethe-Institut. I am also experienced in organising and managing events, having supported the organisation of events under the diplomatic year of Germany in India in Chennai city and Nepal's first national conference on Adolescent Health and Development.

Communications

I am a creative, skilled social media expert with over two years of expertise in managing social media accounts and communications channels. During my various work engagements, I have engaged with various aspects of external communication such as dealing with the press and media, institutional partners and governmental organisations. I am also experienced working with CMS suites such as Joomla, Wordpress and Django.
